description: Kit is a platform that allows creators to automate tasks and developers to build apps for the Kit App Store.

capabilities.name: KIT_ADD_SUBSCRIBER_TO_FORM
capabilities.description: Tool to add a subscriber to a specific form by ID. Use after confirming form and subscriber IDs.

capabilities.name: KIT_CREATE_CUSTOM_FIELD
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new custom field for subscriber data. Use when you need to store extra attributes for subscribers.

capabilities.name: KIT_CREATE_TAG
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new tag in the account. Use when you need a custom label to segment subscribers. Use after confirming tag uniqueness to avoid duplicates. Example: "Create a tag called 'VIP' for premium customers."

capabilities.name: KIT_CREATE_WEBHOOK
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new webhook subscription. Use when you need subscriber or purchase event notifications.

capabilities.name: KIT_DELETE_BROADCAST
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a specific broadcast. Use when you need to permanently remove a broadcast by ID (after confirming the ID). Example prompt: "Delete broadcast with ID 123"

capabilities.name: KIT_DELETE_CUSTOM_FIELD
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a specific custom field. Use after confirming the custom field ID is correct. Deletes the field permanently.

capabilities.name: KIT_DELETE_SUBSCRIBER
capabilities.description: Tool to delete (unsubscribe) a subscriber by ID. Use when you need to remove a subscriber from all sequences and forms after confirming the subscriber exists.

capabilities.name: KIT_DELETE_TAG
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a tag by ID. Use when you need to remove obsolete or incorrect tags after confirming the tag exists.

capabilities.name: KIT_DELETE_WEBHOOK
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a webhook by ID. Use when you want to permanently remove a webhook after confirming its ID.

capabilities.name: KIT_GET_ACCOUNT
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve current account information. Use after validating API key to fetch account ID, plan type, primary email, and timezone details.

capabilities.name: KIT_GET_ACCOUNT_COLORS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve list of colors associated with the account. Use after confirming authentication to fetch account-specific color palette.

capabilities.name: KIT_GET_BROADCAST
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific broadcast by ID. Use when you have a valid broadcast ID and need its metadata.

capabilities.name: KIT_GET_BROADCAST_STATS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve statistics for a specific broadcast by ID. Use after a broadcast has been sent to monitor performance.

capabilities.name: KIT_GET_CREATOR_PROFILE
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve the creator profile information for the account. Use when you need creator metadata (bio, avatar, social links) before publishing or customizing content.

capabilities.name: KIT_GET_EMAIL_STATS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve email statistics for the account. Use after confirming authentication to fetch metrics on emails (sent, opened, clicked) over the last 90 days.

capabilities.name: KIT_LIST_BROADCASTS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a paginated list of all broadcasts. Use when you need to enumerate or review broadcast summaries with cursor-based pagination.

capabilities.name: KIT_LIST_CUSTOM_FIELDS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a paginated list of custom fields. Use after confirming you need to enumerate or inspect all custom fields with cursor-based pagination.

capabilities.name: KIT_LIST_FORMS
capabilities.description: Tool to list all forms. Use when you need to fetch forms with optional filters and pagination.

capabilities.name: KIT_LIST_SEGMENTS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a paginated list of segments. Use when you need to enumerate segments with cursor-based pagination for further processing or display.

capabilities.name: KIT_LIST_SEQUENCES
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a paginated list of all sequences. Use when you need to enumerate sequences with pagination for further processing or display.

capabilities.name: KIT_LIST_SUBSCRIBERS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a list of subscribers. Use when you need to fetch subscriber records with optional filtering, sorting, and pagination.

capabilities.name: KIT_LIST_SUBSCRIBERS_FOR_FORM
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve subscribers for a specific form by ID. Use when you need to page or filter subscribers of a form.

capabilities.name: KIT_LIST_TAGS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a list of all tags. Use when you need a complete inventory of tags for the Kit account.

capabilities.name: KIT_LIST_TAG_SUBSCRIBERS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve subscribers for a specific tag. Use after confirming the tag ID when you need to list subscribers associated with a tag.

capabilities.name: KIT_TAG_SUBSCRIBER
capabilities.description: Tool to associate a subscriber with a specific tag by ID. Use after confirming tag and subscriber IDs when tagging a subscriber.

capabilities.name: KIT_TAG_SUBSCRIBER_BY_EMAIL
capabilities.description: Tool to associate a subscriber with a tag using an email address. Use when you have a tag ID and subscriber email ready. Use after confirming both resources exist.

capabilities.name: KIT_UPDATE_ACCOUNT_COLORS
capabilities.description: Tool to update the list of colors for the account. Use when customizing your Kit account's color palette for broadcasts and templates.

capabilities.name: KIT_UPDATE_CUSTOM_FIELD
capabilities.description: Tool to update a custom field's label. Use after listing or retrieving custom fields and confirming the field ID to rename.

capabilities.name: KIT_UPDATE_TAG
capabilities.description: Tool to update a tag's name by ID. Use after retrieving tag ID and confirming the new name.
